mapper.select: select count(*) from re_mail where del_yn = 'N' and user_id = #{userId}

select r.user_id , r.mail_no , r.read_yn , m.user_name , s.mail_title , to_char(s.trans_time, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') as trans_time from re_mail r join tb_mail s on (r.mail_no = s.mail_no) join tb_member m on ( m.user_id = s.reg_id) where r.del_yn = 'N' and r.user_id = #{userId} order by mail_no desc
select count(*) from re_mail where del_yn = 'N' and read_yn = 'N' and user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from re_mail where del_yn = 'Y' and user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from tb_mail where del_yn = 'N' and reg_id = #{userId}

select s.reg_id , s.mail_no , m.user_name , s.mail_title , to_char(s.trans_time, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') as trans_time from tb_mail s join tb_member m on ( m.user_id = s.reg_id) where s.del_yn = 'N' and s.reg_id = #{userId} and s.temp_save = '02' order by mail_no desc

select s.mail_no , s.mail_title , s.mail_content , s.trans_time , s.reg_id , m.user_name , file_no , file_path , filesystem_name , origin_name from tb_mail s left join tb_attachment on (ref_category ='M' and ref_no = s.mail_no) join tb_member m on(s.reg_id = m.user_id) where mail_no = ${no} and s.del_yn ='N'

mapper.insert: insert into re_mail ( mail_no , user_id ) values ( seq_mailno.currval , #{emailId} )
